channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Enhancing Conversational Agents with Azure AI Language Conversational Language Understanding and Custom Question Answering】用Azure AI语言对话语言理解和自定义问题回答增强对话代理
item.description: 【As we focus our work on empowering the agent design experience, a list of the new features in the we published earlier this week, including the 】当我们将工作重点放在授权代理设计经验上时，我们在本周早些时候发布的新功能列表，包括

item.title: 【Using AI Foundry with .NET MAUI】将AI Foundry与.net Maui一起使用
item.description: 【What's better than a "to do" app? A "to do" app that helps you do more with the power of AI! Using Microsoft.Extensions.AI, you can easily bring the smarts of any model you find in AI Foundry directly into your mobile and desktop .NET MAUI applications. To demonstrate this, I'll show you how to take the first step towards making our .NET MAUI】有什么比“要做”应用更好的？一个“待办事项”应用程序，可以帮助您使用AI的力量做更多的事情！使用Microsoft.extensions.ai，您可以轻松地将您在AI Foundry中发现的任何型号的智能放入您的移动和桌面.NET MAUI应用程序中。为了证明这一点，我将向您展示如何迈向制作.Net Maui的第一步

item.title: 【A story of collaborating agents: chatting with your database the right way】一个合作代理人的故事：以正确的方式与您的数据库聊天
item.description: 【Today, more and more customers are embracing AI with one clear goal in mind: they want to chat with their data. And by "data," they mean all of it: structured tables, unstructured documents, images, audio, and more. This demand has given rise to hybrid approaches that blend semantic understanding with precise data retrieval. But here’s】如今，越来越多的客户正在考虑一个明确的目标：他们想与数据聊天。通过“数据”，它们的意思是：结构化表，非结构化文档，图像，音频等。这种需求引起了混合方法，将语义理解与精确的数据检索融为一体。但这是

item.title: 【Catch Up on Microsoft Build 2025: Essential Sessions for .NET Developers】赶上Microsoft Build 2025：.NET开发人员的基本会话
item.description: 【Build 2025 is a wrap! We packed this year's conference with tons of cool stuff around AI-powered coding, cloud-native apps, and the future of .NET. If you missed the live event or just want to revisit the good parts, here's a roundup of can't-miss content you'll want to check out. [alert type="note" heading="Note"]All sessions are now avail】构建2025是一个包装！我们在今年的会议上围绕着AI驱动的编码，云本地应用程序和.NET的未来，收拾了很多很酷的东西。如果您错过了现场活动或只是想重新审视好零件，这里是您要查看的无误内容的综述。 [警报type =“ note” heading =“ note”]现在所有会话均可

item.title: 【Azure SDK Release (May 2025)】Azure SDK版本（2025年5月）
item.description: 【Thank you for your interest in the new Azure SDKs! We release new features, improvements, and bug fixes every month. Subscribe to our Azure SDK Blog RSS Feed to get notified when a new release is available. You can find links to packages, code, and docs on our】感谢您对新的Azure SDK的关注！我们每月发布新功能，改进和错误修复。订阅我们的Azure SDK博客RSS feed，以便在有新版本时通知。您可以在我们的包装，代码和文档中找到链接

item.title: 【How can I programmatically find the network path by which a folder has been shared?】如何以编程方式找到已共享文件夹的网络路径？
item.description: 【When you right-click a folder in Explorer, select Properties, and go to the Sharing tab, there is a section titled "Network File and Folder Sharing", and in there, it tells you the network path by which this folder has been shared. (Or "Not shared" if it hasn't been shared at all.) How can I obtain this path programmatically? There】当您右键单击Explorer中的文件夹，选择属性，然后转到“共享”选项卡时，有一个标题为“网络文件和文件夹共享”的部分，在那里，它告诉您该文件夹已共享的网络路径。 （如果根本没有共享，则“没有共享”。）如何以编程方式获得此路径？那里

item.title: 【Cloud Academy: Unlock Your Azure Skills and Accelerate Your Career】云学院：解锁您的Azure技能并加速您的职业生涯
item.description: 【When we launched the Cloud Academy benefit for Visual Studio Professional and Enterprise subscribers back in March 2025, our goal was simple: give you the hands-on, practical learning experience you need to confidently master Azure and cloud technologies — without spending a dime beyond your subscription. Why? Because in】当我们在2025年3月推出Visual Studio专业人士和企业订阅者的Cloud Academy福利时，我们的目标很简单：为您提供动手实践，实用的学习经验，您需要确信掌握Azure和Cloud Technologies，而无需花费贵重的订阅。为什么？因为在

item.title: 【Build like Microsoft: Developer agents in action】像Microsoft这样的构建：开发人员正在行动
item.description: 【Every day, developers tackle complex workflows involving planning, coding, reviewing, testing, securing, and releasing software. These tasks, often scattered across various tools and platforms, create friction that slows us down. At Microsoft, we believe AI can change that. This belief led us to create Athena, an AI-powered collaborative ag】每天，开发人员都会处理涉及计划，编码，审查，测试，确保和发布软件的复杂工作流程。这些任务通常散布在各种工具和平台上，会产生摩擦，使我们放慢脚步。在微软，我们认为AI可以改变这一点。这种信念使我们创建了Athena，这是AI驱动的协作AG

item.title: 【The symbolism of the magnifying glass is not universal】放大镜的象征不是通用
item.description: 【Windows 3.0 introduced WinHelp, a program for browsing online help files. The toolbar contained a series of buttons: Index, Back, Browse backward, Browse forward, and Search.】Windows 3.0引入了WinHelp，这是一个用于浏览在线帮助文​​件的程序。工具栏包含一系列按钮：索引，背面，向后浏览，向前浏览和搜索。

item.title: 【Riffing on a typo in the name of the opera Turandot】以歌剧的名义在错别字上即兴
item.description: 【I turned on the radio in the car and heard what was identified by the Radio Data System information as a performance by the Metropolitan Opera of New York of Puccini's Turnadot. Whoever entered the information introduced a typo, because the correct spelling is Turan】我打开了汽车的收音机，听到了无线电数据系统信息所识别的内容，这是纽约纽约图奇尼（Puccini）Turnadot的大都会歌剧院的表演。输入信息的人引入了错字，因为正确的拼写是Turan
